dcterms:description: A suite of continuous control tasks for evaluating continual reinforcement learning algorithms, featuring a simulated Sawyer robot manipulating everyday objects.
dcterms:title: Continual World

dcterms:creator: Maciej Wołczyk

dcterms:description: A sequence of 10 different tasks arranged in a fixed order, used to evaluate transfer learning in continual reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: CW10

dcterms:creator: Maciej Wołczyk
Michał Zajac
Razvan Pascanu
Łukasz Kuciński
Piotr Miłos
dcterms:description: A sequence consisting of CW10 repeated twice, allowing measurement of knowledge transfer in case of task repetitions.
dcterms:title: CW20
